title: New: Liu Bei – Goodness
body:
Loving this new track from London five piece, **Liu Bei**.

So it sounds a little like it could have been written by Chris Martin, however in this case, that’s not a bad thing at all. Epic, anthemic indie pop will always have a place, and Goodness nails it, whilst remaining heartfelt and emotive. Check out _Goodness_ below, and pick it up from [here](https://liubeiwins.bandcamp.com/).
